name: Asociatia Judeteana a Sindicatului Liber al Pensionarilor Vrancea
membership: -FEDERATIA NATIONALA A PENSIONARILOR DIN ROMANIA : http://fnpr.org.ro/
memberOrga:
Nu este cazul.
Noi suntem o singura organizatie locala (judeteana).
goal: Reprezinta si apara drepturile pensionarilor din Judetul Vrancea
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
-Drepturile pensionarilor.
-Interesul acordat de UE cuantumului de pensie din fiecare tara,in vederea aducerii lui la acelasi nivel.
-Interesul acordat de UE problematicii pensionarilor.
